overview:
John O Boyle is the CSMO for Moviestorm. Prior to this he was at start-up Fastmobile who exited in a Trade Sale to RIM Limited in 2007.

John has 25 years Sales and Marketing experience with BA, BT,O2, T-Mobile and other leading companies. He is a frequent speaker on Marketing subjects, has chaired several conferences and is an occasional lecturer in NUI Galway, Ireland.
